content.intro: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries [Vokalia](#) and [Consonantia](#), there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.
content.title: Title

It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.

body.text:
This demo website with content from Storyblok helps you to test out it's capabilities. You can play around with the user interface and checkout the code of this project at Github:

github.com/storyblok/bootstrap-nuxt-demo
body.headline: About this Demo

body.text: The project is open source and based on Bootstrap components.
body.headline: Bootstrap

body.text: This demo uses Nuxt.js but Storyblok also works perfectly with Next.js, Gatsby, Ruby on Rails or any other technology.
body.headline: Nuxt.js

body.text: The header and footer is completely configurable and saved in a content item called "Layout".
body.headline: Header and Footer

body.text: Storyblok is a headless CMS. You are in complete control of how you build your website and this is just an example.
body.headline: You are in Control
